main event: A very bright light was observed in the sky, maneuvering in a zig-zag pattern and ascending rapidly on December 29, 1954.
interesting points: The light was observed for less than 1 minute., The object was reported to have a course heading northwest., Observer experienced an afterimage effect after the light disappeared., Balloons were reported in the area at the time of sighting., The sighting involved one confirmed object.
sighted object: a very bright light in the sky
